text:
Aww yeah! Today we're learning english with 
Avengers star Robert Downey Jr.

But quickly, before we get started, if this is your first 
time here I wanted to invite you to hit that

subscribe button and the bell down below because 
every single week we're going to help you to

understand fast speaking natives, without getting 
lost, without missing the jokes and without

subtitles. Just like our fan Elsa who says 
that our videos are helping her to remember

new vocabulary and to improve her speaking, so 
when you join our community we're going to help

you a ton to reach all of your English 
learning goals too. Let's get into it!

Hey! I have a question: do you want to learn and 
remember thousands of the words that we natives

really use in our everyday speech? Well I have a 
fantastic way for you to do it with our three-part

Master Class. And in addition to this, we'll 
also help you to improve your pronunciation

and to learn all about the culture so that you can 
understand natives no matter how fast we speak.

So it's absolutely free, you can learn more and sign 
up again up here or down the description below.

Hey! Are you a Robert Downey Jr. fan? Then 
you cannot miss this other lesson that we

made with the movie Iron Man. It's really 
fun, you're going to laugh a lot!

Be sure to check that out after you finish this video by 
clicking up here or down the description below.
